description.name: Booster cables 200A 3m
description.long_desc:
These are the features and benefits of the 200A, 3-meter long jump cables, a reliable companion on the road, ensuring a quick and effective vehicle start:




  • Current (200A): These cables provide sufficient power to start most vehicles.


  • Sturdy Construction: Made from durable materials, these cables are resistant to extreme conditions and ensure a long lifespan.


  • 3-meter Length: The length of the cables offers flexibility in positioning vehicles, especially useful in hard-to-reach places.


  • Universal Application: The cables can be used to jump-start various types of vehicles, including cars, motorcycles, boats, and small machines.


  • Easy to Use: The cables have clear markings (+) and (-) as well as color-coded indicators, making correct connection straightforward.


  • Safe and Reliable: High-quality insulation and robust clamps guard against short circuits and ensure a stable connection.


  • Emergency Utility: These cables are essential equipment in any vehicle, particularly during travel, where they can prove invaluable in case of starting issues.


Technical Specifications

















Current 200A
Length 3 m
Thickness 7 mm

description.name: Booster cables 400A 3m
description.long_desc:
Jump cables with a current intensity of 400A and a length of 3 meters are a reliable tool that ensures a quick and hassle-free vehicle start. Here are the main features and benefits of this product:




  • High Current Intensity (400A): These cables are designed for larger vehicles that require higher starting power.


  • Sturdy Construction with Plastic Handles: Made from durable materials, the cables have comfortable and durable plastic handles that make them easy to handle.


  • 3-meter Length: The length of the cables allows for flexible positioning of vehicles, which is particularly useful in hard-to-reach places.


  • Universal Application: The cables can be used to jump-start various types of vehicles, including cars, SUVs, vans, and larger machines.


  • Easy to Use: The cables have clear markings (+) in red and (-) in black, making proper connection easy, even for those unfamiliar with electronics.


  • Safe and Reliable: High-quality insulation and durable clamps protect against short circuits and ensure a stable connection.


  • Useful in Emergencies: Jump cables are an essential part of every vehicle's equipment, especially during travel, where they can be invaluable in case of starting problems.


Jump cables with a current intensity of 400A and a length of 3 meters are a reliable tool that will provide a quick start even for larger vehicles. With them, you'll be able to avoid delays and troubles associated with a discharged battery.


Technical Specifications

















Current 400A
Length 3 m
Thickness 8 mm

description.name: Booster cables 1200A 4,5m
description.long_desc:
Jump Cables 1200A 4.5m - Quick Start, Reliability for Long Journeys!


Reliability and power - these are the words that best describe our 4.5-meter jump cables with an impressive current intensity of 1200A. Here's why it's worth choosing this product:




  • High Current Intensity (1200A): Our cables are designed to meet even the toughest challenges, ensuring a quick start in any situation.


  • Plastic Handles: Sturdy and user-friendly plastic handles guarantee a secure grip.


  • Length of 4.5 Meters: Flexible, 4.5-meter cables provide maneuverability for vehicles, which is particularly important in hard-to-reach places.


  • Universal Application: The cables are suitable for jump-starting various types of vehicles - from passenger cars to larger commercial vehicles.


  • Polarity Markings: Clearly marked positive (+) in red and negative (-) in black make it easy to correctly connect the cables, even for those unfamiliar with electrical work.


  • Secure Transportation: Packaging the product in a durable bag or case ensures comfortable and safe transport of the cables, even in challenging conditions.


  • Versatility: Our 1200A jump cables will prove themselves not only in passenger cars but also in larger vehicles like vans or small buses.


Technical Specifications

















Current 1200A
Length 4.5 m
Thickness 12 mm

description.name: Booster cables 1500A 4,5m
description.long_desc:
Jump Cables 1500A 4.5m - Your Source of Instant Power!


Our jump cables guarantee that you won't be left out in the cold in a crisis situation. Here's why it's worth getting our product:




  • Powerful Current of 1500A: That's enough power to start virtually any vehicle, from small cars to larger commercial vehicles.


  • Rubber Handles: Flexible handles prevent the cables from accidentally slipping during the jump-start process, ensuring maximum safety.


  • Length of 4.5 Meters: Cables of this length allow for comfortable maneuvering and connecting even in hard-to-reach places.


  • Universal Application: Perfect not only for jump-starting passenger cars but also for larger vehicles like vans or small buses.


  • Polarity Markings: Clear markings (+) in red and (-) in black make it easy to correctly connect the cables, which is especially important for those less familiar with electrics.


  • Elastic Materials: The cables are made of elastic material, making them easy to use and preventing them from tangling.


  • Secure Transportation: The sturdy packaging of the product in a durable bag or case ensures comfortable and safe transport of the cables, even in challenging conditions.


Technical Specifications

Length 4.5 m
Thickness 14 mm

  • Secure Transportation: The sturdy packaging of the product in a durable bag or case ensures comfortable and safe transport of the cables, even in challenging conditions.


Technical Specifications

Length 4.5 m
Thickness 14 mm

Max Torque 20 Nm
Capacity 10mm
Torque Settings 18+1
Material High density plastic, rubber


Package Contents:


  • 1x Cordless Drill

  • 2x Li-Ion Battery 18V

  • 1x Charger DC 18V

description.long_desc:
Heavy Duty Steel Foldable Blimb Stairs Trolley TVARDY, folded, with base dimensions 310 x 290 mm.


Product Features



  • Safe and stable construction

  • Maximum load up to 150 kg

  • Easy-grip handles for comfort pushing and pulling

  • Big wheels with a diameter of 150 mm

  • Three wheel cluster on each side for effortlessly movement up/down stairs


Dimensions



  • Unfolded [L x H x W]: 45 x 109 x 60 cm

  • Folded [L x H x W]: 45 x 74 x 37 cm

description.name: Tools bag with tubular handle 47+9
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Large space for tools, 47 interior pockets and tool holders

  • Two elastic loops and two straps with Velcro fastening at the top of the

  • On the front there is a large pocket with a buckle and two pockets with velcro closure

  • On the back of the bag there is a large pocket with a buckle and three open pockets

  • On the sides there is an elastic mesh pocket, a place for a label, a measuring tape hook, a pocket with velcro closure and a belt fastened with a buckle

  • Metal handle covered with black foam for comfortable carrying

  • Removable flap with Velcro

  • Adjustable shoulder strap included

  • The bag is made of highly durable material - 600D Polyester

description.name: Tool bag - Fitter's backpack
description.long_desc:
Cechy produktu

  • Dwie komory główne, jedna na narzędzia a druga na dokumenty, laptopa do 15" lub inne wyposażenie.
  • Klapa zamykana na zatrzask.
  • Możliwość regulacji paska trzymającego klapę oraz bocznych pasków zależnie od wypełnienia plecaka
  • Możliwość regulacji paska trzymającego klapę oraz bocznych pasków zależnie od wypełnienia plecaka.
  • Plecak wyposażony jest w 4 zewnętrzne i 18 wewnętrznych kieszeni na narzędzia ułatwiających przechowywanie transport.
  • Dla komfortu plecak posiada profilowane pasy nośne wraz z pasem piersiowym oraz oddychającymi plecami.
  • Plecak wykonany z wytrzymałego materiału - Poliester 600D
